director of the 120th Military Hospital of the
CH Military Region, said that the hospital had just
successfully operated on a patient with a
large tumor that was compressing the brain and
causing
hemiplegia.  Doctor Hung, a 62-
year-old pvt patient living in Tan Phu Tay commune, Mo Cay Bac district,
Ben Tre province, presented with symptoms of
headache, dizziness, drowsiness,
hemiplegia, and was taken by family members to
Military Hospital 120 for emergency treatment.  The patient's family
declared that the patient had gone to many places for examination and treatment
but the headache had not improved
and the facial swelling had increased. The
scan results showed that the tumor had a
diameter of 38 x 34 x 41 mm. The tumor had to be
pressed to cause edema.  Left parietal brain parenchyma to compress the
left ventricle of a
diabetic hypertensive patient. This is a
difficult surgery. The doctors have closely examined and
surgically removed the tumor. The surgery included
doctors and technicians.  The
surgery lasted from 9:00 a.m. to
11:15 a.m., opening the skull and removing the
cerebral cortex. Taking out the entire tumor to
ensure safety for use. The brain is healthy

A person on the river in

Mr. Tran Van Duc in Tan Thuan commune, Nam

and buy my crab. I'll use the square.
Now, I've never seen this crab before. I'll

likes it.  Right now, they are raised in an

Last night, February 28, at
An Suong intersection, District  12 Ho Chi
Minh City had a serious traffic accident
between a truck and a
motorbike. At about 9:45 p.m. a truck was traveling on
Highway 1 from Nga Tu Ga to Go May
intersection. When it arrived at An Suong intersection in
Trung My Tay Ward, District 12, Ho Chi
Minh City. The driver of the cheap car had to enter Highway
22 when he collided with a motorbike traveling in the same
direction. The accident caused the man and woman on the motorbike to
fall onto the road and be run over by a truck wheel,
killing themselves at the intersection.  District
12 police and the An Suong traffic police team
were present to examine the scene to
investigate the cause. According to residents,
this location has had many
similar tragic accidents caused by vehicles.
right onto Highway 22 Although the

driven by the mother. The father's daughter was driving in the
same direction on the right side and collided, causing the mother and
child to fall onto the road.  The seriously injured little girl was
quickly taken to the hospital,
but she did not survive. The slightly injured mother
received news that the
Di An City police had come to examine the scene
to investigate the cause of the accident.  Nghe

The g operates on the

The fall-winter 2024 2025 collection of
French fashion brand Victoria
Thomas has just been introduced to the
public at Paris Fashion Week this time, the
designer outfit brings
outfits with elegant and seductive beauty.
Inspired by  Inspired by Kh Rodin's famous work Kiss
with the theme of the passionate love of
couples, the collection is a
harmonious combination of two extremes of softness and
strength with this spirit.  The costumes are still
highly functional and
creative. The designers try to
recreate the beauty of
19th century stone sculpture art through cut-
out pleats and knotted details.
Leather details also
create a nostalgic look for the oversized collection, which also
creates a unique feature
of this collection.
Paris Fashion Week will last until March 5,

Four new Tien models with denominations of five copies.
10 copies, 20 copies and 50 copies are displayed

New banknotes are issued to

environment as well as financial markets.  In

Shanghai because this city is
entering the flowering season of this tree, many people
have fallen.  Come to the garden that has been around for more than
500 years just to see and enjoy the
scent of plum blossoms.
Nan Gui Garden is a Chinese garden
famous for its plum trees. The
ancient architecture here makes the
spring scene even more memorable.  Adding
charm and poetry, the fragrant Plum Blossom
nestled between the
pavilions and towers of the Jiangnan-style garden
is the biggest difference between
enjoying plum blossoms in the
classic Jiangnan garden of  us and
other places, when the flowers combine with the
ancient architecture of this place, I find that they
bring a very harmonious picture.
In addition to plum blossoms, there are also many
other types of flowers blooming brilliantly here. Visitors
can  You can walk in the garden to
see more than 100 colorful flower pots.
Currently, the early-blooming plum blossom varieties in
Bui garden are in their peak flowering period.
Some late-flowering plum blossom varieties will bloom
in early
